item.title: vim
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: neovim + 1.2 Remapped Cursor Movement + 1.3 Remapped Insert Mode Keys + 1.4 Remapped Text Manipulating Commands in Normal Mode + 1.5 Other Useful Normal Mode Remappings + 1.6 Remapped Commands in Visual Mode 2 Window Management 2.1 Creating Window Through Split Screen 2.2 Moving the Cursor Between Different Windos 2.3 Resizing Different Windows 2.4 Closing Windows 3 Tab Management 4 Terminal Keyboard Shortcuts Plugins Keybindings (Screenshots/GIF provided!) AutoCompletion

item.title: Docker
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: 简介 Go语言开发实现，对进程进行封装隔离，属于操作系统层面的虚拟化技术。由于隔离的进程独立于宿主和其他的隔离的进程，因此称其为容器 。 基本概念

item.title: git
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: 分布式版本控制系统（Distributed Version Control System，简称 DVCS） 客户端并不只提取最新版本的文件快照， 而是把代码仓库完整地镜像 下来，

item.title: linux
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: ArchLinux x86_64 GNU/Linux Keep It Simple, Stupid package manager system Pacman AUR (Arch User Repository) dwm key action super+k hiddle current window tab super+h/l change current window size super+e change current window super+Retrun open termial super+c open chrome super+t show split window super+m show current window max super+f show current window fullscreen super+shift+2 move current window to x super+ctrl+2 add x to current window st ranger key action du show size yp yank path [] change parent file r select open file way zh show hidden file oc order file by modifyed time os order file by size on order file by name / search file and use n or N f only show matched file S open st in this file path V open or create new file in nvim way M create new folder yy&pp copy file dd&pp cut file dD delete file or folder cw rename file or use vim a i I A w open ra list c zip select files yy&X unzip zipfile

item.title: redis
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: set key value get key mset mget 一次设置读取多个值 exists 判断key是否存在 del 删除key type 检查value类型 expire 设置key的有效值 expire key 时长(s) ex : set key value ex 时长(s)

item.title: sercet
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: jupyter jupyter 0198 1 2 3 4 5 6 @echo off cd "c:\jupyter" jupyter notebook echo 【按任意键退出】 pause>nul exit mysql 3306 root 12346 1 2 3 4 5 6 @echo off cd "C:\MySQL\Engine\bin" mysqld --console echo 【按任意键退出】 pause>nul exit mkdocs 1 mkdocs serve --dev-addr=0.0.0.0:5858 zhtj ID ggcjdss9/ server 10.30.0.14 enfiyjy-svr\svradmin ggcjdss9/
